item.title: CVE-2023-41239|2024-08-02T18:54:04.433Z -- blubrry -- powerpress%20podcasting%20plugin%20by%20blubrry
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Blubrry PowerPress Podcasting plugin by Blubrry.This issue affects PowerPress Podcasting plugin by Blubrry: from n/a through 11.0.6.
